channel.title: tool on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in tool on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-21
item.description: Meta Has Created A New Tool To Animate Your Child’s Drawings Using AI (1 minute read) Animated Drawings is a tool from Meta that can automatically animate drawings of human-like figures.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-28
item.description: Celebrating Imgur’s Next Chapter (2 minute read) Imgur has been acquired by MediaLab.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-12
item.description: TikTok is reportedly testing a job recruitment tools (1 minute read) TikTok is testing a recruitment tool to help people find jobs and to help companies, recruiters, and brands find candidates.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-28
item.description: Apple’s M2 chip has entered production and will ship as soon as July (2 minute read) Apple’s custom-designed M2 chips entered production this month.
